title: (x) Ketel One font - Bradley {Stephen}
content:
I thought this seemed like a font that would in the Dover Art Nouveau series, but it wasn't.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131020155313im_/http:/typophile.com/files/DSC00939.JPG)
author: Tom Cannon

comments.content:
Well, at least I had the Dover part right. I haven't seen the medieval book.

Thanks for the link Stephen.
the ketel one font is a bit nicer than your standard Bradley.

I found a free version here: [http://www.1001fonts.com/font\_details.html?font\_id=2887](http://web.archive.org/web/20131020155313/http:/www.1001fonts.com/font_details.html?font_id=2887 "http://www.1001fonts.com/font\_details.html?font\_id=2887")

I am sure the quality is poor, but maybe someone is interested.
